posts.name: Adith Senthil
posts.cooked: When will we get the results for project 1?

posts.name: DataScience
posts.cooked:
Dear TDS support team,

please let us know your update on the project 1 results

@carlton

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: There will be an email sent out about this.

posts.name: Anshu Raj
posts.cooked: December 2nd it is sir. Around what time it will be released ?

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Project 2 Discussion Thread [Sep 2024 Term] Tools in Data Science
TDS Project 2 is available at tools-in-data-science-public/project-2-automated-analysis.md at tds-2024-t3 · sanand0/tools-in-data-science-public · GitHub It’s an interesting project. You have to write an LLM-based program to analyze a dataset. You have to convince an LLM that your code and output are good. This is hard. It’s something you haven’t done before. (Nor most people in the world.) So I strongly urge you to start early! Please use this thread for any questions. You’ll learn a lot…

posts.name: Faiz Malik
posts.cooked:
Are the Project 1 results out?

@carlton Sir, Please update Project 1 and ROE results in the dashboard.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Project 1 will be pushed most likely beginning of next week.
ROE results have already been sent via email.

posts.name: Harsh Shah
posts.cooked: No @carlton sir, ROE results are not yet shared. Please look into it
